ReflectionSourceType: Indicates where to get the reflection source from.
Cubemap: Cubemap to use for reflection if ReflectionSourceType is set to RS_SpecifiedCubemap.
SourceCubemapAngle: Angle to rotate the source cubemap when SourceType is set to SLS_SpecifiedCubemap.
Brightness: A brightness control to scale the captured scene's reflection intensity.
CaptureOffset: World space offset to apply before capturing.
